text: [In jahudijon hamon] Kasone hastand, ki guftand: "Alloh taolo ʙo mo ahdu pajmon ʙastaast, ki ʙa heç pajomʙare imon najovarem, to [firistodae hamrohi xud] ʙarojamon qurʙonie ʙijovarad, ki otaş [-i az soiqa ʙarxosta] onro [ʙa nişonai paziriş] ʙisūzonad". [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onon] Bigū: "Hatman, peş az man pajomʙarone ʙudand, ki daloili oşkorro hamrohi on ci gufted, ʙarojaton ovardand. Agar rost megūed, pas, caro ononro kuşted
